title: #459 When Radio Was King with Cipha Sounds
itunes:title: When Radio Was King with Cipha Sounds
description:
Or as I wanted to call it *Airhorn Sound*

Cipha Sounds came over to the studio to talk about his days as a DJ on Hot97 in New York. He explained to me, the whitest Jew boy in the world, what hip hop is, and how he embraces it as his culture. He also told me how he broke artists to the public such as Rick Ross and Rihanna... Oh and that he basically invented the airhorn sound.

 

For more Ari: 

Subscribe on YouTube

Follow Ari on Instagram - @arishaffir

Shop Merch 

Ari Shaffir | Linktree

Catch The Chemistry Set with Cipha Sounds and Wil Sylvince at the Comedy Cellar every Wednesday night! The Chemistry Set with Wil & Cipha

Listen to Cipha’s podcast with Wil Sylvince Talk Clearlyer on Apple Podcasts, Spotify and more: Talk Clearlyer with Cipha Sounds & Wil Sylvince 

 

The Music:

Sports - Who Listens To The Radio

Nas- Hate Me Now

Nina Sky- Move Ya Body

Aesop Rock - Daylight
